successes.title: Kings of War
successes.description: A fantasy tabletop game with simple, competitive rules and high quality, affordable miniatures.

Pledges.description: Recruit – Electronic copy of the Kings of War rulebook
Soldier – A Kings of War Hardback Rulebook, Mini-rulebook and 10 Dice
Sergeant - Soldier + a regiment from your army of choice.
Standard Bearer – Soldier + One Player Battle Set of your choice.
Champion – Soldier + 1 Army Set + Undead Vampiress from the cover art
Veteran – Soldier + 2 units of Werewolves + 2 units of Ogres + 1 unit of Ogre Shooters + Wound Counters + Undead Vampiress from the cover art
Warlord – Soldier + Orc Army + Undead Army + Undead Vampiress and Orc Wizard
Captain – Soldier + 1000 point Kings of War Army + Undead Vampiress and Orc Wizard
Lieutenant – Soldier + 1 x 1000 point Elite Kings of War Army + Undead Vampiress and Orc Wizard.
General – Captain + another 1000 point Kings of War Army
Commander – Soldier + 4x1000 point Kings of War Armies + Undead Vampiress and Orc Wizard
Supreme Commander – Soldier + all six 1000 point Kings of War Armies + Undead Vampiress and Orc Wizard
Prince – Champion + your One Player Battle Set painted by the Mantic Studio + Mantic Army Case

Warmaster – Prince + one unpainted 2000 point army + a new Hero named in your honour + Painted Resin Master of the figure painted by Worthy Painting + unique rules and backstory + Signed Print of the Concept Art (Will ship early in 2 Parts)

Eternal Warrior - Prince + one unpainted 2000 point army + a new Hero sculpted in your likeness + Painted Resin Master of the figure painted by Worthy Painting + named in your honour + unique rules and background  + Signed Print of the Concept Art (Will ship early in 2 Parts)

Living Legend – King + 1000 point Mantic Human Army on launch + General sculpted in your likeness and named in your honor. We’ll include you in the development of the rules for the human army and we will also get you to the Mantic Bunker to pick up your army and play a game of Kings of War with Ronnie himself.

God of War – Soldier + you and your partner sculpted and named as Vampires + resin master painted by Golem + 3 unpainted Resin and Metal copies + unique background and rules + 1000 Point Undead Army painted by Golem Painting Studio + four 1000 Point unpainted Armies from the Kings of War and/or Warpath range + a new piece of art of your figures signed by the Ronnie and the artist + a tour of the Mantic Studio and game with Ronnie. (Will ship early in two parts)
